content: materials purl soho s posy 1 75% superwash merino 15% cashmere and 10% nylon each skein is approximately 159 yards/ 50 grams - main color mc 1 1 2 2 2 skein s approximately 110 159 210 260 315 yards required - contrast color cc 1 skein approximately 82 85 87 89 91 yards required note previously we also used hand jive s nature s palette 3 100% merino wool and anzula s squishy 4 80% superwash merino 10% cashmere 10% nylon to make these socks both yarns are no longer available through our website you will also need - a set of us 2 3 mm double pointed needles 5 - stitch markers 6 including one unique - purl soho s pom pom maker set 7 size small + large gauge 32 stitches and 40 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch sizes toddler kid adult small adult medium adult large - finished foot circumference 6 7 8 9 10 inches unstretched comfortably stretching 1-2 inches - foot length adjustable samples we made the toddler kid and adult small sizes in the following colors - toddler size mc winter sky cc blue bayou - kid size mc pink nectar cc pink smoke - adult small size mc tawny gold cc amber orange 1 https //www purlsoho com/posy 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=968 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/2008/04/14/whits-knits-pom-pom-socklets/ 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/2011/08/18/lauras-loop-whits-pom-pom-socklets/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 7 https //www purlsoho com/pom-pom-maker-set html
